entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aklavik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -42.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aklavik Airport 01:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -42.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -46.7°C
Wind: NNW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
